id.description: Language ID. Generally (but not always) this matches the file extension of source files written in the language.
id.x-prompt: Language ID (short, usually matches the file extension)

scopeName.description: The grammar scope that serves as an entrypoint to the TextMate AST.  Generally (but not always) this is "source.<id>"

name.description: Name for the grammar's Nx project. Must be valid for a filename. If not provided, will default to "<id>-grammar".

parentProjectName.description: The Nx project for the VS Code extension this grammar will belong to.

outputPath.description: Workspace-relative path to the directory for the generated JSON file. If not provided, will use the same output path as the parent project's `build` target.

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting)

directory.description: A directory where the project is placed
